summary: Set before Mass Effect 3, James Vega and a group of soldiers try to protect a human colony from the Collectors, who wish to capture the colonists for unknown purposes.
cast: Freddie Prinze Jr.|Monica Rial|Vic Mignogna|Todd Haberkorn|Eric Vale|Josh Grelle|Travis Willingham|Justin Cook|Marc Swint|Bruce Carey|Laura Bailey|Jad Saxton|Kara Edwards|Jason Douglas|Patrick Seitz|Jamie Marchi|Jeff Johnson|Jerry Jewell|John Burgmeier|Terri Doty|Taliesin Jaffe|Jerome Fifty-Seven|Kaboom|Troy Williams|Craig Dvorak|Chad Cocuzza
title: Mass Effect: Paragon Lost
